Build 20011115

1. Open the Synchronize view
2. Undock it
3. Close it
4. Select a project and synchronize with team stream
Observe: You get the following stack trace in the .log:

Could not recreate in latest build. Please retry. If it still fails please 
reopen this defect.

This still happens in build 20011120

Here are the exact steps I followed:
1. Start a new workspace
2. Open the Team perspective
3. Add a repository of your choice
4. Add a project of your choice from the HEAD stream
5. Drag the Synchronize view and undock it
6. Close the Synchronize view
7. Select the project and choose Team -> Synchronize with stream
Observe: When the Synchronize view pops up, you get the 'Widget has the wrong 
parent' stack trace in the .log file.

I get the same error in build 2001-12-06 with the following steps:

1) In the debug perspective, undock the "Inspector" view.
2) Close the Inspector view
3) Shutdown and restart eclipse
4) Run something in debug mode and hit a breakpoint
5) Select any variable in the variables view, and choose "Inspect"

The "Wrong parent" exception gets printed in the log.

Ryan, try to reproduce this problem if you can. If so, you can dive in to 
understand what is causing this problem...if it too complex, let me know.

This problem is not limited to the Synchronize view or the Team perspective. 
Undocking any view in any perspective, closing it, and opening it again 
(undocked) seems to cause the same Widget has Wrong Parent problem. For 
example, undocking, closing, and opening the Outline view of the Java 
persective or doing the same with the Variables view of the Debug perspective 
both cause the error to appear in the .log file.

Steps:
1. Undock any view in any perspective
2. Close the view
3. Open the view

The following stack trace will appear in the .log file:

2 org.eclipse.ui 2 Problems occurred when invoking code from plug-in: 
org.eclipse.ui.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Widget has the wrong parent
	at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:1873)
	at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:1819)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget.error(Widget.java:368)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite.setTabList(Composite.java:390)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.WorkbenchPage.updateTabList
(WorkbenchPage.java:1588)

(InternalPlatform.java:821)
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.Platform.run(Platform.java:395)

(WorkbenchPage.java:116)

	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.WorkbenchPage.activate

	at org.eclipse.core.boot.BootLoader.run(BootLoader.java:321)
	at SlimLauncher.main(SlimLauncher.java:14)

The root of the problem is that the parent of the undocked view is expected to 
be a composite that is a part of a composite that is part of the workbench 
shell. However, the parent of the undocked view is the shell of the undocked 
view. That is causing the Widget has Wrong Parent error.
*** Bug 8664 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
